about_the_game:
The demo is a limited version of Taiko 5. It contains 2 Percussion Kits, 2 Music Kits, and 1 Parameter/Effect Kit.

There are a total of 56 different sounds to choose from.

It's also possible to load your own set of 16 Custom WAVs (please see manual for instructions).

Everything else is fully operational.
detailed_description:
The demo is a limited version of Taiko 5. It contains 2 Percussion Kits, 2 Music Kits, and 1 Parameter/Effect Kit.

There are a total of 56 different sounds to choose from.

It's also possible to load your own set of 16 Custom WAVs (please see manual for instructions).

Everything else is fully operational.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sonoma 14.5
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X 4 GB
  • Storage: 96 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Build was tested and created on this mac.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sonoma 14.5
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz 6-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X 4 GB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Build was tested and created on this mac.

name: Taiko 5 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 96 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-97850H @ 2.60 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti or higher with 6GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Taiko 5 is a pattern based music sequencer designed for use with a game controller. It has built-in sounds, kits, effects, a pattern recorder, seamless song and pattern switching, randomizing, recording to a WAV file, and more! This is the demo.
supported_languages:
